ℹ 179 more rows ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} affiliations(facility_ccn = "33Z302") ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` # A tibble: 3 × 8 npi pac first middle last facility_type facility_ccn parent_ccn 1 1396989059 8921259557 MARY K HALL… Nursing home 33Z302 331302 2 1538173869 0547299091 IL JUN CHON Nursing home 33Z302 331302 3 1801893318 3577568724 ROB L DEMU… Nursing home 33Z302 331302 ``` ::: ::: ### Individual Provider ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} lst( nppes = nppes(npi = 1043245657), providers = providers(nppes$npi), order_refer = order_refer(nppes$npi, pivot = FALSE), clinicians = clinicians(nppes$npi), affiliations = affiliations(nppes$npi), hospitals = map_dfr(affiliations$facility_ccn, ~ hospitals(facility_ccn = .x))) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` $nppes # A tibble: 1 × 29 npi entity_type enum_date last_update status prefix first middle last 1 1043245657 Individual 2006-07-11 2013-10-08 Active Dr. MARK K FUNG # ℹ 20 more variables: gender , credential , sole_prop , # purpose , address , city , state , zip , # country , phone , fax , tx_code , tx_primary , # tx_desc , tx_license , tx_state , id_code , # id_desc , id_state , id_identifier $providers # A tibble: 1 × 10 npi pac enid specialty_code specialty_description state first middle 1 1043245657 7810… I200… 14-22 PRACTITIONER - PATHO… VT MARK K # ℹ 2 more variables: last , gender $order_refer # A tibble: 1 × 8 npi last_name first_name partb dme hha pmd hospice 1 1043245657 FUNG MARK TRUE TRUE TRUE TRUE TRUE $clinicians # A tibble: 1 × 19 npi pac enid first middle last gender credential school grad_year 1 1043245657 781089… I200… MARK K FUNG Male MD UNIVE… 1999 # ℹ 9 more variables: specialty , facility_name , pac_org , # members_org , address_org , city_org , state_org , # zip_org , phone_org $affiliations # A tibble: 2 × 7 npi pac first middle last facility_type facility_ccn 1 1043245657 7810891009 MARK K FUNG Hospital 470003 2 1043245657 7810891009 MARK K FUNG Hospital 330250 $hospitals # A tibble: 3 × 21 npi_org pac_org enid_org enid_state facility_ccn organization 1 1568419976 3779491071 O20021111000009 VT 470003 UNIVERSITY OF V… 2 1568419976 3779491071 O20021111000009 VT 470003 UNIVERSITY OF V… 3 1033270699 2769396878 O20120110000201 NY 330250 CHAMPLAIN VALLE… # ℹ 15 more variables: doing_business_as , specialty_code , # specialty , incorp_date , incorp_state , structure , # address , city , state , zip , location_type , # registration , multi_npi , reh_conversion , subgroup ``` ::: ::: ### Organizational Provider ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} lst( hospitals = hospitals(organization = "Elizabethtown Community Hospital"), affiliations = map_dfr(hospitals$facility_ccn, ~ affiliations(facility_ccn = .x))) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` $hospitals # A tibble: 2 × 20 npi_org pac_org enid_org enid_state facility_ccn organization specialty_code 1 18917851… 357755… O201011… NY 331302 ELIZABETHTO… 00-85 2 14070615… 357755… O202208… NY 33Z302 ELIZABETHTO… 00-85 # ℹ 13 more variables: specialty , incorp_date , incorp_state , # structure , address , city , state , zip , # location_type , registration , multi_npi , # reh_conversion , subgroup $affiliations # A tibble: 192 × 9 npi pac first middle last suffix facility_type facility_ccn parent_ccn 1 100302… 6204… STACI L CART… Hospital 331302 2 101314… 8022… DEBO… M KAMP… Hospital 331302 3 101391… 5890… JOSE M ACOS… Hospital 331302 4 102337… 6901… LIND… B WILH… Hospital 331302 5 104325… 0345… PAOLO FEDI Hospital 331302 6 104339… 4183… ANTH… F TRAM… Hospital 331302 7 104367… 7214… VANE… FIOR… Hospital 331302 8 106340… 4284… NIDAL MAKH… Hospital 331302 9 107309… 0547… BROO… A MAGGY Hospital 331302 10 107358… 0749… TODD J WHIT… Hospital 331302 #
